oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Black business in Nashville
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Claiming Space
Business Districts
African American business enterprises
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A listing of African American owned businesses in Nashville, Tennessee. Compiled by the students in Merl Eppse's History Club at Tennessee State University.

Mr. Eppse was a professor of history at Tennessee State University. Students in his History Club at TSU were sent out into the African American community to canvas business owners and learn more about local, African American owned businesses. This list shows the African American owned businesses in Nashville as identified by the students.
